title: Constant Therapy Clinician
description:
Constant Therapy Clinician is an evidence-based, speech, language and cognitive therapy app developed by neuroscientists and speech-language pathologists from Boston University. Deliver the latest, science-based therapy in the clinic, and enable your patient's progress at home with an AI-driven customizable Home Exercise program.

Provide the most comprehensive therapy to your patients, including people recovering from stroke, Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI), or people living with aphasia, dementia, and other neurological conditions. Join a community of over 600,000 users who have embraced progress, completing over 250 million evidence-based therapy activities through Constant Therapy.

Standardize therapy and data reporting across your health system with our Enterprise license that supports HIPAA compliance, enterprise-grade security and access control.


BENEFITS:

• Use 87+ evidence-based interactive therapy categories targeting speech, language, and cognitive skill areas, with 500,000+ individual exercises to keep your patients engaged.

• Engage your patients with virtually unlimited therapy activities in speaking, memory, attention, reading, writing, language, math, attention, comprehension, problem solving, visual processing, auditory memory, and many other essential skill-building exercises.

* Provide Home-exercise-programs and carryover exercises with a click of a button, saving you a lot of time and effort.

• Improve outcomes with personalized Home Exercise Programs that are automatically customized for your patients and automatically progress with your patients needs - powered by Constant Therapy’s powerful AI.

* Enable patients to progress at home, between clinic sessions, and after you discharge them from your care

• Save time (10-15 mins per patient session) on patient prep, data reporting, and discharge summaries with our detailed reporting features.

• Review client performance and compliance to inform clinical decisions.

• Get reporting, enterprise-grade security, centralized management, and access control for HIPAA compliance with Constant Therapy's Enterprise license.

• Easily populate data into your own EMR/EHR system.

Constant Therapy Clinician is free for personal use by clinicians, educators, and researchers in one-on-one therapy sessions with their patients. Clinicians at HIPAA-compliant institutions can also utilize the app with an Enterprise subscription.


THE SCIENCE BEHIND CONSTANT THERAPY:

Constant Therapy was designed by clinicians and scientists at Boston University specifically to target the challenges of recovery after stroke, brain injury, aphasia, dementia or other neurological disorders. It systematically tracks patient progress across a variety of functional domains including: language, cognition, memory, speech, attention, comprehension, visual processing and much more.

Constant Therapy sets the gold standard with over 70 studies validating the clinical evidence behind our speech, language, and cognitive therapy exercises. We are also backed by 17 peer-reviewed research studies using Constant Therapy, which substantiate the efficacy of our program. For a complete list of clinical studies and research visit: https://constanttherapyhealth.com/science/

Constant Therapy is advancing the science of rehabilitation by collaborating with scientists and researchers at top-tier institutions such as University of Texas, Boston University, University of Washington and many more.

A multiple-award winner from  the American Stroke Association, AARP, Hearst Health, UCSF Health Hub, and Fierce Innovation Awards, Constant Therapy is recommended by thousands of speech-language pathologists, neurologists, occupational therapists, and clinicians at hospitals, clinics, and rehabilitation facilities everywhere.

CONTACT US:
Email - support@constanttherapy.com
Web - www.constanttherapy.com
Privacy Policy -  www.constanttherapy.com/privacy/
Terms of Use -  www.constanttherapy.com/eula/

summary: For Speech-language therapists / SLPs, OTs: Aphasia, dementia, stroke, TBI care
